mapper.select: select customerDescr1 centre,asnReference1 code,skuDescr cinvname,sku cinvcode ,time ddate,qty,codeDescr status from tc_v_intast

select customerDescr1 centre ,soReference1 code ,skuDescr cinvname ,sku cinvcode, traceid, palletstatus ,taskqty qty,codeDescr status,IO,udf02,udf01 from tc_v_outtast where UDF01+udf02+'_'+IO = #{floor}
